name: opengist
tagline: A self-hosted alternative to GitHub Gist
description: OpenGist is a self-hosted alternative to GitHub Gist. It lets users create and manage code snippets with syntax highlighting, versioning, and a web-based editor.

features.title: Code Snippets
features.description: Create and manage code snippets with syntax highlighting for over 100 programming languages

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Edit code directly in the browser with syntax highlighting, auto-completion, and keyboard shortcuts

features.title: Fork And Clone
features.description: Fork existing snippets to create variations and clone repositories for local development

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find snippets quickly using full-text search across code content, titles, and descriptions

features.title: User Management
features.description: Support multiple users with individual accounts, profiles, and snippet collections

features.title: REST API
features.description: Programmatic access to all functionality through REST APIs for automation and integration
